english.segment1: Walking along the high tide line. Watching the pacific from the sidelines. Wonder what it means to live together?. Looking for more than just guidelines
english.segment2: Looking for signs in the night sky, Wishing that I wasnÂ’t such a nice guy. Wonder what it means to live forever?. Wonder what it means to die?
english.segment3: [Chorus]. I know that there's a meaning to it all. A little resurrection every time I fall. You got your babies, I got my hearses. Every blessing comes with a set of curses. I got my vices, I got my vice verses. I got my vice verses
english.segment4: The wind could be my new obsession. The wind could be my new depression. The wind goes anywhere it wants to. Wishing that I learned my lesson
english.segment5: The ocean sounds like a garage band. Coming at me like a drunk man. The ocean tells me a thousand stories. None of them are lies
english.segment6: [Chorus]. I know that there's a meaning to it all. A little resurrection every time I fall. You got your babies, I got my hearses. Every blessing comes with a set of curses. I got my vices, I got my vice verses. I got my vice verses
english.segment7: Let the pacific laugh. Be on my epitaph. With it's rising and falling. And after all, it's just water. And I am just soul. With a body of water and bones. Water and bones
english.segment8: Where is God in the night sky?. Where is God in the city light?. Where is God in the earthquake?. Where is God in the genocide?
english.segment9: Where are you in my broken heart?. Everything seems to fall apart. Everything feels rusted over. Tell me that you're there
english.segment10: [Chorus]. I know that there's a meaning to it all. A little resurrection every time I fall. You got your babies, I got my hearses. Every blessing comes with a set of curses. I got my vices, I got my vice verses. These are my vice verses. These are my vice verses
english.segment11: Yeah. These are my vice verses
